#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ull unsigned long long
#define lli long long int
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define pb(x) push_back(x)
#define F(i,a,n) for(i=(a);i<(n);++i)
#define FD(i,a,n) for(i=(a);i>=(n);--i)
#define FE(it,x) for(it=x.begin();it!=x.end();++it)
#define V(x) vector<x>
#define s(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define M(x,i) memset(x,i,sizeof(x))
#define all(x) x.begin(), x.end()
#define rall(x) x.rbegin(), x.rend()
#define debug(i,sz,x) F(i,0,sz){cout<<x[i]<<" ";}cout<<endl
#define fr first
#define se second
#define gc getchar_unlocked
 
#define MOD 1000000007
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	s(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		s(n);
		lli ar[n];
		int i,j;
		F(i,0,n)
		{
			sl(ar[i]);
			
		}
	//	int sum[n];
		
		lli m=INT_MIN;
	//	M(sum,0);
		map<int,string> mp;
		mp[0] = "red";
		mp[1] = "blue";
		mp[2] = "pink";
		mp[3] = "white";
		mp[4] = "black";
		mp[5] = "violet";
		mp[6] = "cyan";
		mp[7] = "yellow";
		mp[8]= "green";
		mp[9]= "brown";
		//cout<<mp[0];
		F(i,0,n)
		{
			//int sum = 0;
			while(ar[i]/10 >0){
			lli sum = 0;
			while(ar[i]>0)
			{
				sum+=ar[i]%10;
				ar[i]/=10;
				
			}
			ar[i] = sum;
			//
		}
		m = max(m,ar[i]);
		
		}
	//	cout<<ar[0]<<ar[1]<<ar[2];
		cout<<mp[m]<<endl;
		
	}
}
